page.title: 01GENERAL VIEW OF TURTON
page.content: Grid reference 03680414 covers an area known as{Turton,}which contains the village of{Egerton.}The northern section is in{Lancashire,}the southern in{Greater Manchester. Egerton}is part of the metropolitan borough of{Bolton. The land ranges from 250 to 1000 feet above sea level, and is mainly attractive undulating moorland and forest. The S.W. section contains the village of{Egerton,}which has developed considerably over the last 20 years into an expensive residential area of Bolton. The area is designated as part of the{Anglezarke Recreation Area,}and contains 3 reservoirs, providing water for an area of Bolton.
